nodes.text: The Order of the Esoteric Pulsar was a religious organization in the galaxy. As followers of the Esoteric Pulsar, the Order had a text known as the Book of Stars which was used as a guide to their perception of the mystical energy field known as the Force. As well as the book, the Order had an archive that detailed various topics of faith and spirituality. An excerpt from the archive, called "Faith and the Force of Others", regarded spirituality and its connection to the Mid Rim desert moon of Jedha.
